examples.example: 我每天都会背着书包开开心心地去上学。

translate.english: I go to school happily with my schoolbag on my back every day.

examples.example: 可爱的小朋友背着书包蹦蹦跳跳地走在上学的路上。

translate.english: The lovely children are skipping along on the way to school with schoolbags on their backs.

examples.example: 我背着书包满怀期待地走向知识的殿堂。

translate.english: I walk towards the palace of knowledge with my schoolbag on my back full of expectations.
